title: Terror - Hijos de los Cometas (1997)
description:
Terror - "Hijos de los Cometas" (1997).  Complete album, 192 kbps.

Includes Jon Dette (ex-Testament, ex-Slayer) on drums for several tracks.

This is a rare album, not otherwise available at TPB.  It was hard to find, so I thought I'd share it here in case anyone else wants it.

Track titles and filenames are all in original Spanish/Mexican.
But here's an English translation:

Terror - "Sons of the Comets" 

1. Liberty
2. Scientific Numbers
3. Revolution
4. Day of the Dead
5. Mother Sierra
6. The Wind
7. Sons of the Comets
8. Blind Justice
9. World Ceremony
10. Hypnotism
11. Alarm
12. Freedom Town
13. Immortal
14. Human
